# dismissMenu()

**Instance Method**

Dismiss the edit menu if present.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func dismissMenu()
```

## Discussion

You use this method to dismiss the menu, for example, from an observer callback in your app.

## Managing edit menu interactions

- **delegate**: An object that customizes presentation of the menu and actions to display for an edit menu interaction.
- **presentEditMenu(with:)**: Presents an edit menu using the object you provide for configuration.
- **reloadVisibleMenu()**: Updates the actions an edit menu displays.
- **updateVisibleMenuPosition(animated:)**: Updates the position of the currently visible menu with an option to animate the action.
- **location(in:)**: Returns the location of the user interaction in the specified view’s coordinate system.
